CustomField.description: US-3690 Is KYC in place in each required jurisdiction? In the event not completed, the current status in each jurisdiction. If the KYC relates to a new client, confirmation that KYC is yet to be completed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is KYC in place in each required jurisdiction? In the event not completed, the current status in each jurisdiction. If the KYC relates to a new client, confirmation that KYC is yet to be completed.
CustomField.label: KYC Status
